title: Friday the 13th: Crypto Markets Red as Bitcoin Price Slips Below $10.3K
text:
Friday the 13th: Crypto Markets Red as Bitcoin Price Slips Below $10.3K

Cryptocurrency News 52 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 02:01PM ET)

© Reuters. Friday the 13th: Crypto Markets Red as Bitcoin Price Slips Below $10.3K Friday, Sept. 13 — crypto markets have continued to report mixed signals, with failing to hold $10,300 support on the day. The majority of the top 20 coins by market cap are seeing red this Friday the 13th, with Tezos’ (XTZ) losses reaching nearly 2.3% at press time. However, (DASH) is seeing a far larger growth on the day, up nearly 7% over the past 24 hours at press time, according to Coin360. Keep track of top crypto markets in real time hereContinue Reading on Coin Telegraph
